title: IBM to buy Mountain View-base Confluent for $9.3 billion to expand AI services
description: International Business Machines Corp. is buying the data-streaming platform Confluent Inc. for about $9.3 billion, marking one of its largest takeovers yet and a major bet on the kind of enterprise software that artificial intelligence tools need to perform tasks in real time.
content:
By Liana Baker, Bloomberg

title: President Trump teases executive order to limit state regulations on AI
description: President Trump vowed to take executive action this week establishing "One Rulebook" nationally for regulating artificial intelligence after similar efforts repeatedly failed in Congress.
content:
WASHINGTON — President Trump vowed to take executive action this week establishing “One Rulebook” nationally for regulating artificial intelligence after similar efforts repeatedly failed in Congress.

title: AI tools help choose best embryos for IVF
description: Artificial intelligence tools can now help choose the most promising embryos for in vitro fertilization (IVF), although experts have warned of some ethical concerns.
content:
Artificial intelligence tools can now help choose the most promising embryos for in vitro fertilization (IVF), although experts have warned of some ethical concerns.

title: Tesla’s Sky High Valuation Prompts Morgan Stanley to Cut Rating
description: Elon Musk is eager to transform Tesla Inc. into a robotics and artificial intelligence company, but the electric-vehicle maker’s stock price already reflects those businesses and is at a “full valuation,” according to Morgan Stanley, which lowered its rating on the company to the equivalent of a hold, its first cut since June 2023.

title: Quote of the day by Alan Turing: 'A computer would deserve to be called intelligent if it could...'
description: Alan Turings work laid the foundation for modern artificial intelligence, particularly through his concept of the Turing Test, which evaluates a machines ability to exhibit human-like behaviour. Instead of debating abstract definitions of thinking, Turing proposed a practical method: if a computer can convincingly imitate human responses in conversation, it can be considered intelligent.
content:

title: Trump's Executive Order: A Single AI Rule Sparks Bipartisan Controversy
description: President Trump's announcement of a forthcoming executive order seeks to establish a single national rule for artificial intelligence, aiming to override diverse state laws. The move faces bipartisan opposition from state leaders, emphasizing the necessity for AI guardrails. Tech companies advocate for this national standard to enhance US competitiveness in AI.
content: President Donald Trump has announced plans to sign an executive order implementing a single nationwide rule for artificial intelligence, challenging state-specific legislations. He argues this centralized approach is crucial for ensuring the US remai... [665 chars]

title: Trump says he will sign executive order curbing state AI rules
description: The US president says he will establish “ONE RULE” on artificial intelligence aimed at limiting state-level policies. Read more at straitstimes.com.
content:

title: Study explores AI-enhanced wearable devices for Type 2 diabetes and prediabetes care
description: Artificial intelligence-enhanced wearable devices, such as continuous glucose monitors (CGMs), have dramatically improved the ability of people with diabetes and even prediabetes to better understand and control their blood sugar. But research on AI-enhanced wearable devices has been uneven, often focused on just a few kinds of devices, data types and AI models.
